name: Worms

write_file.content:
[autoexec]
mount c $GAMEDIR
mount d $GAMEDIR/CD/ -t cdrom
d:
SETUP.EXE
exit

content:
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox.ini
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/WORMS.EXE
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/CD/
    src: $DISC
- write_file:
    content: '[autoexec]

      mount c $GAMEDIR

      mount d $GAMEDIR/CD/ -t cdrom

      d:

      SETUP.EXE

      exit

      '
    file: $GAMEDIR/install.ini
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/install.ini
    name: dosexec
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $GAMEDIR/WORMS
- write_file:
    content: '[autoexec]

      mount d $GAMEDIR/CD/ -t cdrom'
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox.ini
